summary: Removes the \"glow\" sounds from the character skills UI.
descriptionHtml:
I always felt the \"glow\" musical notes from the character\'s skills UI (the ones that play when a skill\'s logo is displayed) were a bit cheesy, so I made this mod to remove them.

-------- HOW TO USE -----------

Installation: Just drop the contents in your main Skyrim folder.

Uninstallation: Delete the following files from the /Data/sound/fx/ui/skills/glow/:
ui_skills_glow_01.wav
ui_skills_glow_02.wav
ui_skills_glow_03.wav
ui_skills_glow_04.wav

---------------------------------------

Enjoy!
author: Diego Cohen

files.name: Skill UI - No Glow Sounds v1
